description:
A total of 5 scenarios will be added.
Enjoy playing new scenarios.

■Content
 Scenario "Zeus's Judgment"
 Scenario "Oust the Archvillains"
 Scenario "Battle for the Wine of the Gods"
 Scenario "Battle for the Bracelet"
 Scenario "All-out War! DW Vs. SW"

■How to use
You can select scenarios from camp by selecting "Sortie" - "DLC".
name: Scenario Pack 2
